cs.LG, cs.NE, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.CL

The paper discusses a method to overcome catastrophic forgetting in neural networks, which is a common problem in machine learning. The paper proposes a modification to the gradient descent optimization method, which is a fundamental technique used in many areas of computer science, including machine learning. Therefore, the paper is likely to belong to the sub-categories of machine learning (cs.LG), neural networks (cs.NE), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), computer vision (cs.CV), and natural language processing (cs.CL).
